Carolina Panthers to place Robert Hunt, Austin Corbett on IR

The Carolina Panthers, 0-2 and preparing for Sunday's home opener, will place starting guard Robert Hunt and center Austin Corbett on injured reserve after each suffered a significant fourth-quarter injury in Sunday's 27-22 loss to the Arizona Cardinals.

Arizona Cardinals fend off Carolina Panthers for 2-0 start

A week after surviving a late-game push by New Orleans Saints, the Arizona Cardinals had to pull off a similar feat Sunday in their home opener against the Panthers, holding off Carolina 27-22 after racing out to 27-3 lead early in the third quarter.
